item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Thursday, April 10, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:

9. An LLM Query Understanding Service (7 points | 15 comments)
10. what if the poison were rust? (11 points | 1 comment)

15. Visualizing a Million Time Series with the Density Line Chart (6 points | no comments)
16. Async from scratch 1: What's in a Future, anyway? (2 points | no comments)
17. React for Two Computers (5 points | no comments)

19. Better typography with text-wrap pretty (75 points | 10 comments)
20. Is not writing tests unprofessional? (2019) (8 points | 20 comments)
21. Parser Combinators Beat Regexes (50 points | 27 comments)

24. Koreo: The platform engineering toolkit for Kubernetes (3 points | no comments)
